about_the_game:
Student Pack Includes:

• 1.500 chips per scenario.
• Save up to 10 projects.
• Cinematics with use of a maximum 15 Scenes.
• Unlock People Collection.
• Unlimited Multiplayer Sessions.
• Save Multiplayer Projects.
• Updates.

Surprise your teacher and see that a video game can break the routine of lectures. Create Co-Working Rooms and prototype with your classmates in an agile and creative way.
Do you want to build a Circular Economy project? Perhaps, expose how Incoterms work, or foreign trade processes? Do you want to create a mockup to explain the industrial safety risks of a factory? Do you want to explain how a wastewater treatment plant works? How about, explain in detail an accusatory criminal process in the military branch. With 4Prot you can build this and much more.

legal_notice: Licensed software purchased with VR Labs

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel i3 6300 @ 3.8GHz or AMD FX 8150 @ 3.6GHz with 4 hardware threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VIDIA GeForce® GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 or equivalent DX11 compatible GPU with 2GB of memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690K @ 3.5GHz or AMD FX 8350 @ 4.0GHz with 4 hardware threads
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: 4Prot - Student Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 6300 @ 3.8GHz or AMD FX 8150 @ 3.6GHz with 4 hardware threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VIDIA GeForce® GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 or equivalent DX11 compatible GPU with 2GB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690K @ 3.5GHz or AMD FX 8350 @ 4.0GHz with 4 hardware threads
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 480 4GB, NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB or equivalent DX11 compatible GPU with 4GB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Student Pack Includes: • 1,500 chips per scenario. • Save up to 10 projects. • Cinematics with use of a maximum 15 Scenes. • Unlock People Collection. • Unlimited Multiplayer Sessions. • Save Multiplayer Projects. • Updates throughout the subscription.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
